verbs.description: [ARG0: romanian ex - prison chief] [R-ARG0: who] [V: tortured] [ARG1: inmates] dies in jail alexandru visinescu a romanian communist - era prison guard serving a 20-year sentence for crimes against humanity died monday in prison at 93 romanian authorities said visinescu was the first prison guard from the early years of communism to go on trial in romania he became a bucharest the associated press romania andrei muraru lt col alexandru visinescu rahova prison hospital ramnicu sarat lt col alexandru visinescu
